New Records: Duckens Nazon scored a hat-trick in the match against Sint Maarten
Key Match Events: Attys Christopher opened the scoring for Haiti with a header from a corner in the 40th minute [1-0]
Duckens Nazon scored with a header in the 59th minute [2-0]
Mikael Cantave scored for Haiti in the 77th minute [4-0]
Nazon added his hat-trick in the 82nd minute [5-0]
Cantave secured his double in the 85th minute [6-0]
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Sébastien Migné revealed his starting 11 with several changes to allow several players to prove their ability
Post-Match Reflections: This victory consolidates the Grenadiers' leadership in Group C
Note that goalkeeper Jhony Placide got his first clean sheet in this group stage
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the 'Estadio Centroamericano' in Mayagüez
The Haitian Football Federation has announced the upcoming match schedule
Others: The match was broadcast with a video link
